text: Thomas Gayle Morris (August 20, 1919 - March 4, 2016) was an American politician. He was born in Eastland County, Texas. Morris served in the New Mexico House of Representatives from 1953 to 1958. He was elected as a Democrat to the United States House of Representatives in 1958. Morris began serving on January 3, 1959, and left office January 3, 1969, after being defeated for re-election. Morris died in Amarillo, Texas on March 4, 2016 at the age of 96.Thomas Morris-obituary ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Politicians from Texas Category:Members of the New Mexico Legislature Category:United States representatives from New Mexico Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Thomas G. Morris
